settings.title:
Capture the Unseen in the Everyday

108MP + 13MP + 2MP + 2MP
settings.text:
Introducing the highest resolution camera on a smartphone ever. Capture the unseen in every scene with the 108MP sensor.
Get more control over each image with the RAW mode built into the camera app. Shoot incredible ultra-wide landscapes.
Try out macro photography or get the perfect bokeh effect for all your portraits. A mighty quad camera setup loaded with professional camera.

settings.title: LOG Mode
settings.text: Add a splash of colour to your photos at the edit table. Add a splash of colour to your photos at the edit table.

settings.title: RAW Mode
settings.text: Create the perfect shot even under the toughest lighting conditions. Create the perfect shot even under the toughest lighting conditions.

settings.title: All-New Camera Setup
settings.text:
A mighty quad camera setup loaded with professional camera features like RAW mode
that elevate the smartphone camera experience.

settings.title: 7P Lens
settings.text: Impressive light gathering unlocks the full potential of the 108MP camera setup. Try out macro photography or get the perfect bokeh effect for all your portraits.

settings.title: HEIF
settings.text: A JPEG equivalent which takes approximately 50% lesser storage space without losing out on image quality. Try something new every day!

settings.title: AI Pixel
settings.text: Comprehensive pixel optimization for vibrant pictures. All of this made possible with one mighty quad camera setup
Before AI Pixel Optimization
After AI Pixel Optimization

Shopify is a commerce platform that allows anyone to set up an online store and sell their products. Merchants can also sell their products in person with Shopify POS.

Shopify started over ten years ago when our founder Tobi wanted to sell snowboards with his company at that time called Snowdevil. He quickly realized it was incredibly challenging to sell snowboards online without an easy to use ecommerce platform. So he decided to create it himself, and Shopify was born.

Shopify is now the leading commerce platform designed for businesses of all sizes. Whether you sell online, on social media, in store, or out of the trunk of your car, Shopify has you covered. The first Shopify store was our own, and it’s been our mission to make commerce better for everyone ever since.

Whether you’re a budding jewelry designer and want to start selling your products, or a musician and want to sell your latest mixtape, or if you have an established business and want to grow, Shopify can help you. Hundreds of thousands of entrepreneurs from over 175 countries trust Shopify to help sell their products.

Below you’ll find the different products or services that you can sell on Shopify. Even if you know what you’re selling already, it may give you some ideas for other services you could sell to grow your business.

settings.title: We are Shopify experts. Need help growing your Shopify sales?
settings.text: We provide innovative solutions to expand your business. Let us take your online shop to new dimension in success! Boost your store sales and define your brands with Avone.

Design Quality

First impressions of online store is 94% design related. Quality web design establishes trust and credibility. We provide high quality shopify themes.


One Click Demo Installation

It's very easy to install the demo just by a single click. It’s totally automatic and save your time.


Top Quality Documentation

Extensive documentation where each section of the theme and its features are described in a easy way to understand.

Unlimited power and
customization possibilities

Save time and frustration by visually editing your site. Build professional layouts in just a few minutes.


High Speed & Performance

Performance matters the most for your online shop ! We leverage the strategy and help you earn maximum ROI.


Top Notch Support

Get the best technical support in 24 hours. If you have questions or problems, we are glad to help you

settings.quote: This theme is amazing, I bought it few months and I am getting ready to launch my website with this new theme. While designing the website it was very easy to edit the theme which is very important for me, but I did have to contact the customer support few times and hire them to do some custom base. Every time they answered my emails right away and the service that was needed was provided in timely manner. I am extremely satisfied and very happy that I chose their theme.
settings.author: HAPPY CUSTOMER

settings.quote: This is the one and only theme you need for you shopify store. The features are well thought out and complete with means you do not need to add on many apps that would otherwise cost you a monthly subscription fee. Plus the support is in setting up the theme and doing customisation on the website. Highly recommendation.
settings.author: Themeforest buyer
